posts.post_title: Lot of 24 British Tobacco cards GONE
posts.post_content:
Free lot of 24 British Tobacco cards to the first person who posts "I will take it" in this thread.  I will pay for shipping in the U.S. 

All have back damage.

  THESE HAVE BEEN CLAIMED.

3 1914 Wills Dogs

2 1917 Wills Gems of Russian Architecture

5 1916 Wills Gems of French Architecture

1 1937 Player's Coronation series

1 1907 Player's Highland Clans

12 1909 Highette's Cathedrals and Churches
